node.title: PHP Case Sensitivity
node.description: Php Case Sensitivity: In PHP, keywords (e.g. if, else, while, echo, etc.), classes, functions, and user-defined functions are not case-sensitive. However; all variable names are case-sensitive!

node.title: The PHP echo Statement
node.description: The PHP echo Statement: The echo statement can be used with or without parentheses: echo or echo().
